about_the_game:
The Deluxe Pack includes:
- PC Wallpapers (x5 designs. Each design is available in 1280 x 720, 1600 x 1900, 1920 x 1080)
- Soundtrack (x16 tracks)
- Azur Lane: Crosswave Desktop Theme

*Note: Once purchased and downloaded, all of the Deluxe Pack contents can be found in the ""Deluxe Pack"" folder in the game root directory.
detailed_description:
The Deluxe Pack includes:
- PC Wallpapers (x5 designs. Each design is available in 1280 x 720, 1600 x 1900, 1920 x 1080)
- Soundtrack (x16 tracks)
- Azur Lane: Crosswave Desktop Theme

*Note: Once purchased and downloaded, all of the Deluxe Pack contents can be found in the ""Deluxe Pack"" folder in the game root directory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core-I5 3.2GHz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti or above
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or above
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Deluxe Pack includes PC wallpapers, the soundtrack, and an Azur Lane: Crosswave Desktop Theme!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
